EmailTemplate.description: This template will be used to send notification to MBC case owner when FEAK Analysis fails.
EmailTemplate.name: GEMS MBC Test Failure FEAK Analysis
EmailTemplate.subject: {!GEMS_MBC_Testing__c.Account_Name__c} - {!GEMS_MBC_Testing__c.Account_Number__c} - {!GEMS_MBC_Testing__c.Case_Effective_Date__c} - MBC Testing Failed
